Headline: Temporary #151 Sheridan Northbound Reroute near Washington between LaSalle-Clark
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan Northbound buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage near Washington between LaSalle-Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan Northbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State, Washington and resume normal route due to street blockage near Washington between LaSalle-Clark.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Jefferson Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
